title: Edge of Glory: The Inside Story of the Quest for Figure Skating's Olympic Gold Medals
description: Opening with the 1997 U.S. National Championships and chronicling the subsequent year through the 1998 Olympic games, a respected sports journalist goes behind the scenes of this popular sport to give readers a look at the personalities and events that make it tick. Reprint. 40,000 first printing.
author: Christine Brennan
